dishes.name: Craft Beer Flight
dishes.shortDescription: Selection of four local craft beers
dishes.fullDescription: A curated selection of four 4oz pours featuring our rotating taps of local craft breweries. Includes tasting notes and brewery information.

dishes.name: Fresh Lemonade
dishes.fullDescription: Refreshing lemonade made with fresh-squeezed lemons, pure cane sugar, and sparkling water. Available in classic, strawberry, or lavender.

dishes.name: Coffee of the Day
dishes.fullDescription: Freshly roasted single-origin coffee beans from our featured roaster. Origin and tasting notes change weekly. Served black or with cream.

dishes.name: Loaded Nachos
dishes.shortDescription: Crispy tortilla chips with all the fixings
dishes.fullDescription: House-made tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, black beans, jalape√±os, diced tomatoes, sour cream, and guacamole.

dishes.name: Buffalo Wings
dishes.shortDescription: Crispy chicken wings with buffalo sauce
dishes.fullDescription: Eight crispy chicken wings tossed in our signature buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.shortDescription: Crisp romaine with parmesan and croutons
dishes.fullDescription: Fresh romaine lettuce tossed in house-made Caesar dressing with shaved parmesan, anchovies, and garlic croutons.

dishes.name: Bistro Burger
dishes.shortDescription: Grass-fed beef burger with local fixings
dishes.fullDescription: 8oz grass-fed beef patty with lettuce, tomato, red onion, and bistro sauce on a brioche bun. Served with hand-cut fries.

dishes.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
dishes.fullDescription: Fresh Atlantic salmon pan-seared with lemon herb butter, served with roasted seasonal vegetables and wild rice pilaf.

dishes.name: Chicken Penne Pasta
dishes.shortDescription: Grilled chicken with penne in creamy sauce
dishes.fullDescription: Grilled chicken breast over penne pasta in a creamy garlic parmesan sauce with sun-dried tomatoes and fresh basil.

dishes.name: BBQ Ribs
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked pork ribs with house BBQ sauce
dishes.fullDescription: Half rack of slow-cooked pork ribs glazed with our house-made BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw and baked beans.

dishes.name: Vegetarian Wrap
dishes.shortDescription: Grilled vegetables in a spinach tortilla
dishes.fullDescription: Grilled zucchini, bell peppers, mushrooms, and onions with hummus and mixed greens in a spinach tortilla. Served with chips.

dishes.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
dishes.shortDescription: Warm chocolate cake with molten center
dishes.fullDescription: Rich chocolate cake with a warm, molten chocolate center. Served with vanilla ice cream and fresh berries.

dishes.name: Apple Pie
dishes.fullDescription: Traditional apple pie made with Granny Smith apples, cinnamon, and a flaky butter crust. Served warm with vanilla ice cream.

dishes.name: Cheesecake
dishes.fullDescription: Creamy New York style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust. Choice of strawberry, blueberry, or chocolate sauce.
